"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53783d6d6368727c89000000#post_53783d6d6368727c89000000
Pretty much.

College freshman think it's about constantly having sex and drinking then wind up with a baby on the way or kicked out for partying.  I like to think of it as a example of social darwinism.  My college has only a 5% graduation rate.

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53783e4b6368727c5f300000#post_53783e4b6368727c5f300000

Social darwinism is in itself a pretty debatable concept. Heck, Darwin's theory supports cheating when you get down to it, but that's beside the point.

My way of seeing it is the same way my old man told me when I got to highschool "From this point onwards, you will realize on your own if you have the willpower needed to prove that you deserve the free will you have. If you will be able to be responsable with the freedom that is given to you and how you will take advantage of it"
